arts.ttl: Bundesliga schedule: Borussia Dortmund vs. Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Harry Kane and first-place FC Bayern visit Borussia Dortmund on Saturday for the first meeting of the 2024-25 Bundesliga season between the fiercest rivals in German soccer. Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are set to square off in the latest installment of Der Klassiker ("The Classic" in German).

arts.ttl: Gittens for England? Dortmund winger adds another stunner
arts.sum: While former Borussia Dortmund star Jude Bellingham was enduring a torrid Champions League night at Anfield, another Englishman currently at the Bundesliga club was lighting up the competition.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Borussia Dortmund Cruise to Victory Over Dinamo Zagreb in the Champions League
arts.sum: Goals from Jamie Gittens, Ramy Bensebaini, and Serhou Guirassy secured all three points in the Champions League. Malen didn’t get himself on the scoresheet tonight, but he was Dortmund’s most consistent goal threat and deserved to come away from the game with something to show for his efforts.

arts.ttl: Dortmund cruise to victory over Dinamo in the Croatian capital
arts.sum: Nuri Şahin's side returned to UEFA Champions League action facing a daunting trip to Dinamo Zagreb. BVB ran out 3-0 winners to take all three points on offer back to the Rührpott.

arts.ttl: Serhou Guirassy vs. Harry Kane: how do Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich's star strikers compare?
arts.sum: Last term, Guirassy started the season at full blast, reaching double figures with 10 goals in just five Bundesliga matches. Watch: All 50 Harry Kane goals in the Bundesliga

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Dynamo Zagreb vs. Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Official team news has just been released for Die Schwarzgelben who made the trip to Croatian side Dynamo Zagreb for Matchday 5 of the UEFA Champions League.

arts.ttl: Match Thread: Borussia Dortmund Visit Dinamo Zagreb in the Champions League
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. There are legal means listed for you to watch the game.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund predicted XI v Dinamo Zagreb
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy is set to return to the Borussia Dortmund starting line-up after an infection sidelined the Guinean forward for their win against Freiburg at the weekend. The 28-year-old is…

arts.ttl: 5 reasons Borussia Dortmund will win Der Klassiker
arts.sum: League leaders Bayern are sure to provide the biggest test to Dortmund's immaculate home record, yet the fans will also be at their nosiest as they aim to cheer their side to their first home Klassiker win in the Bundesliga in over six years. Borussia Dortmund have incredible home form, star strike power and recent history on their side as they aim to land a statement win over Bayern Munich.

arts.ttl: 5 reasons Bayern will win Der Klassiker against Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Their ability to remain so dominant away from the Allianz Arena will hold them in good stead when they visit the Signal Iduna Park, especially given Dortmund ’s home form that has seen them go unbeaten at home in 11 games in all competitions. Their ability to find the back of the net is not the only reason Bayern are sitting atop the Bundesliga table right now; they also have the best defensive record in the league, with just seven goals conceded in their first 11 matches.
